医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
来自印度的仿制药与更严重的不良事件有关一项新研究发现，印度生产的仿制药与使用它们的患者相比，与在美国生产的同等药物相比，使用它们的仿制药与“严重不良事件”的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/generic-drugs-from-india-linked-to-more-severe-severe-forverse-vents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/generic-drugs-from-india-linked-to-more-severe-severe-forverse-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69e47dd6-6e00-4b78-944f-abc0dff511c9 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 09:15:51 -0500 Generic drugs from India linked to more severe adverse events
研究发现骨骼肌胰岛素抵抗背后的分子机制胰岛素耐药性先于并预测2型糖尿病（DM2）的发作，这是一种慢性疾病，在全球范围内引起高发病率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-uncovers-molecular-mechanisms-behind-insulin-insulin-isulin- secistance-in-skeletal-muscle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-uncovers-molecular-mechanisms-behind-insulin-sulin- nistance-in-skeletal-muscle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7B7CAC34-A24C-4215-9EE2-6726B329A94A Wed, 19 Feb 2025 07:44:00 -0500 Study uncovers molecular mechanisms behind insulin resistance in skeletal muscle
减肥药的在线处方的监管镇压现在，在线药房必须在分配减肥药物之前进行面对面的咨询，以确保安全，适当使用高风险药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/regulatory-crackdown-on-online-prescriptions of-weight-loss-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/regulatory-crackdown-on-online-prescriptions-of-weight-loss-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=124bb8c5-6e11-41be-b66a-e6676f5ebf6a Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:55:00 -0500 Regulatory crackdown on online prescriptions of weight-loss drugs
阻止移动互联网两周可改善心理健康和福祉皮尤研究中心（Pew Research Center）称，今天，几乎每个美国人（91％）拥有可以访问互联网的手机。在2011年，只有大约三分之一。另一项研究发现，他们每天平均盯着小屏幕5小时16分钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/blocking-mobile-internet-for-two-weeks-weeks-improves-mental-mental-mental-health-health-health-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/blocking-mobile-internet-for-two-weeks-weeks-improves-mental-mental-health-health-health-health-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bA7CA64-DE69-473C-AF08-AF08-056264A73E11 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:49:29 -0500 Blocking mobile internet for two weeks improves mental health and well-being
与遗传学相比，生活方式和环境因素在健康和过早死亡中起着更大的作用由牛津人口健康的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，包括生活方式（吸烟和体育锻炼）以及生活条件在内的一系列环境因素对健康和过早死亡的影响比我们的基因更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/lifestyle-and-and-environmental-factors-bignd-bigger-bigger-biger-role-in-health-health-health-health-h-thealth and-profemature than-than-than-genetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/lifestyle-and-and-envormental-factors-bigger-bigger-biger--biger-role-in-health-health-health-and-health--------- than-than-genth-genetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714b4247-9b56-41a5-a319-18f36e535b32 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:41:12 -0500 Lifestyle and environmental factors play bigger role in health and premature death than genetics
新的mRNA技术靶向疾病细胞，同时保留健康的细胞想象一下，癌症治疗的突破，其中只有恶性细胞是靶向的，可以保留健康的宿主细胞。或对异常蛋白质合成的患者进行治疗以产生健康的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-mrna-technique-targets-disease-cells-cells-whes-while-sarparing-sarparing-healthyy-ones-imag.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-mrna-technique-targets-disease-cells-cells-while-sparparing-sparparing-healthy-onesy-ones-imag.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A5C2E6A4-DFD6-4963-B67B-F30B751E249B Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:36:00 -0500 New mRNA technique targets disease cells while sparing healthy ones
研究表明，芬兰多发性硬化症治疗的快速转化Oulu大学领导的一项登记研究检查了2013年至2022年之间在芬兰复发复发多发性硬化症（MS）的早期治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-shows-rapid-transformation-in-multiple-sclerisosis-warteatment-warteatment-ineatment-infinland.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-shows-rapid-transformation-in-multiple-sclerisosis-warteatment-warteatment-ineatment-infinland.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8783c116-ff48-4337-a5f5-e8fed40d10a5 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:32:15 -0500 Study shows rapid transformation in multiple sclerosis treatment in Finland
研究着眼于薄荷香烟禁令对吸烟习惯的影响在《卫生经济学》上发表的新研究表明，美国禁止薄荷香烟的人可能会增加试图戒烟但同时支持非法薄荷香烟市场的人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-looks-at-aT-Effects-of--menthol-cigarette-ban-on-on-smoking-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-looks-at-aT-efts-aT-Effects-of-menthol-cigarette-ban-ban-on-on-smoking-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08668B78-13A6-4DE4-9DE1-9DE1-9DDBB4D4DFFF5 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:27:24 -0500 Study looks at effects of menthol cigarette ban on smoking habits
Sprint分析支持老年人的较低血压目标收缩压干预试验（SPRINT）的结果支持了患有高血压的社区居住老年人的血压降低，以降低心血管疾病和早期死亡的风险，但强烈的血压降低也可以增加急性肾脏损伤的风险并患有危险的低血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/sprint-analysis-supports-supports-lower-bowood-pressure-press-----------------for oder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/sprint-analysis-supports-supports-lower-lower-balood-pressure-pressure-presgure-presgure-forer-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb08ddb2-d3ac-456a-A395-60F261EC4C4C4A Wed, 19 Feb 2025 06:24:05 -0500 SPRINT analysis supports lower blood pressure targets for older adults
